context.p: A label within the Deployment Inventory Tool is used with the Managed Configs to categorise it as being for a particular site, or a particular size for example. Apart from being a visual aid, the labels are also used to help with automation.
Create a new label for the Deployment Inventory Tool

info.p: Click the label view from the nav bar at the top
Click the Create new label button
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Restrictions on the fields are as follows:

ul.li: Name must be between 2 and 50 characters

info.p: Click the Save button and you will be redirected back to the previous page
NOTE: Label will not save if any fields are invalid (RED in UI)

result.p: A New Label is created in the Deployment Inventory Tool.
